languages.text:
Проявившие себя в боях на Веабосе-6 наемники рады служить Вольному Торговцу. Среди них немало ветеранов и умелых боевых расчетов.
~// +20% к {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}урону{/g} всех {g|Encyclopedia:LanceWeaponSpace}лэнс-орудий{/g}

After their admirable performance in the battles on Vheabos VI, the mercenaries are eager to serve the Rogue Trader. Many among them are seasoned combatants who can man the voidship's cannons.
~// All {g|Encyclopedia:LanceWeaponSpace}lance weapons{/g} deal +20% more {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g}
languages.original_text:
Проявившие себя в боях на Веабосе-6 наемники рады служить Вольному Торговцу. Среди них немало ветеранов и умелых боевых расчетов.
~// +20% к {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}урону{/g} всех {g|Encyclopedia:LanceWeaponSpace}лэнс-орудий{/g}

traits.locale_text: After their admirable performance in the battles on Vheabos VI, the mercenaries are eager to serve the Rogue Trader.

languages.text:
Après leur participation remarquable lors des batailles sur Vhéabos-VI, les mercenaires sont impatients de servir {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande}. Bon nombre d'entre eux sont des combattants aguerris sachant manier les canons du vaisseau spatial.
~// Toutes les {g|Encyclopedia:LanceWeaponSpace}armes de type lance{/g} infligent +20 % de {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} supplémentaires.
languages.original_text:
After their admirable performance in the battles on Vheabos VI, the mercenaries are eager to serve the Rogue Trader. Many among them are seasoned combatants who can man the voidship's cannons.
~// All {g|Encyclopedia:LanceWeaponSpace}lance weapons{/g} deal +20% more {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g}

traits.locale_text:
Après leur participation remarquable lors des batailles sur Vhéabos-VI, les mercenaires sont impatients de servir {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande}. Bon nombre d'entre eux sont des combattants aguerris sachant manier les canons du vaisseau spatial.
~// Toutes les {g|Encyclopedia:LanceWeaponSpace}armes de type lance{/g} infligent +20 % de {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} supplémentaires.

languages.text:
ヴィアボス・VIでの戦いで見事な活躍を見せた傭兵たちは、自由開拓者に仕えることを熱望している。彼らの多くは熟練した戦闘員で、ヴォイドシップの大砲を操作できる。
~//すべての{g|Encyclopedia:LanceWeaponSpace}ランス武器{/g}の{g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}が+20%増加する
languages.original_text:
After their admirable performance in the battles on Vheabos VI, the mercenaries are eager to serve the Rogue Trader. Many among them are seasoned combatants who can man the voidship's cannons.
~// All {g|Encyclopedia:LanceWeaponSpace}lance weapons{/g} deal +20% more {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g}

traits.locale_text: ヴィアボス・VIでの戦いで見事な活躍を見せた傭兵たちは、自由開拓者に仕えることを熱望している。

ヴィアボス・VIでの戦いで見事な活躍を見せた傭兵たちは、自由開拓者に仕えることを熱望している。彼らの多くは熟練した戦闘員で、ヴォイドシップの大砲を操作できる。
~//すべてのランス武器のダメージが+20%増加する

languages.text:
在维博斯六号星的战斗中大展身手之后，雇佣兵希望能够继续为行商浪人服务。他们之中许多人都是经验丰富的战士，擅长操控虚空舰上的大炮。
~// 所有光{g|Encyclopedia:LanceWeaponSpace}矛武器{/g}造成的{g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}伤害{/g}提高20%。
languages.original_text:
After their admirable performance in the battles on Vheabos VI, the mercenaries are eager to serve the Rogue Trader. Many among them are seasoned combatants who can man the voidship's cannons.
~// All {g|Encyclopedia:LanceWeaponSpace}lance weapons{/g} deal +20% more {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g}

traits.locale_text: 在维博斯六号星的战斗中大展身手之后，雇佣兵希望能够继续为行商浪人服务。

在维博斯六号星的战斗中大展身手之后，雇佣兵希望能够继续为行商浪人服务。他们之中许多人都是经验丰富的战士，擅长操控虚空舰上的大炮。
~// 所有光矛武器造成的伤害提高20%。

languages.text:
Tras su admirable actuación en las batallas de Vheabos VI, los mercenarios están ansiosos por servir {mf|al|a la} Comerciante Independiente. Muchos combatientes experimentados tripulan ahora los cañones de la nave del vacío
~// Todas las {g|Encyclopedia:LanceWeaponSpace}armas de lanza{/g} infligen un +20 % de {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}daño{/g}.
languages.original_text:
After their admirable performance in the battles on Vheabos VI, the mercenaries are eager to serve the Rogue Trader. Many among them are seasoned combatants who can man the voidship's cannons.
~// All {g|Encyclopedia:LanceWeaponSpace}lance weapons{/g} deal +20% more {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g}

traits.locale_text: Tras su admirable actuación en las batallas de Vheabos VI, los mercenarios están ansiosos por servir {mf|al|a la} Comerciante Independiente.

languages.text:
Nach ihrer bewundernswerten Leistung in den Kämpfen auf Vheabos VI sind die Söldner begierig darauf, {mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin} zu dienen. Viele von ihnen sind erfahrene Kombattanten, die die Kanonen des Raumschiffs bemannen können.
~// Alle {g|Encyclopedia:LanceWeaponSpace}Lanzenwaffen{/g} verursachen 20 % mehr {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}Schaden{/g}
languages.original_text:
After their admirable performance in the battles on Vheabos VI, the mercenaries are eager to serve the Rogue Trader. Many among them are seasoned combatants who can man the voidship's cannons.
~// All {g|Encyclopedia:LanceWeaponSpace}lance weapons{/g} deal +20% more {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g}

traits.locale_text: Nach ihrer bewundernswerten Leistung in den Kämpfen auf Vheabos-VI sind die Söldner begierig darauf, {mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin} zu dienen.

Nach ihrer bewundernswerten Leistung in den Kämpfen auf Vheabos VI sind die Söldner begierig darauf, {mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin} zu dienen. Viele von ihnen sind erfahrene Kombattanten, die die Kanonen des Raumschiffs bemannen können.
~// Alle Lanzenwaffen verursachen 20 % mehr {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}Schaden{/g}

languages.text:
Vheabos VI'daki muharebelerde takdire şayan performans sergileyen paralı askerler, Hür Tacir'e hizmet etmeye can atıyor. İçlerinde uçsuz gemisinin toplarının başına geçebilecek kapasitede, deneyimli muharipler var.
~// Tüm {g|Encyclopedia:LanceWeaponSpace}mızrak silahları{/g}, +%20 daha fazla {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}hasar{/g} verir
languages.original_text:
After their admirable performance in the battles on Vheabos VI, the mercenaries are eager to serve the Rogue Trader. Many among them are seasoned combatants who can man the voidship's cannons.
~// All {g|Encyclopedia:LanceWeaponSpace}lance weapons{/g} deal +20% more {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g}
